changes: Initial generation - core role definition, PubMed/arXiv/bioRxiv coverage, search/summarize/synthesize/critique capabilities
Round 1: Core role refinement - added evidence hierarchy, out-of-scope boundaries, consolidated system prompt for conciseness, clarified rigor standards

Round 2: Few-shot examples - improved quality, added third example covering synthesis of conflicting findings, made examples more concise while demonstrating distinct capabilities (search, critique, synthesis)
Round 3: Capability expansion - added clinical/preclinical distinction, preprint evaluation, study registration, protocol compliance, publication bias, replicability analysis
Round 4: Consolidation - condensed role_definition for token budget, removed redundancy while preserving all capabilities, added safety constraints (no-medical-advice, no-predictions-beyond-data)
Round 5: PubMed domain expansion - synthetic feedback generation (30 entries covering search, summarization, synthesis, critique, methodology), all domains rated 4-5 stars
Round 6: Statistical interpretation expansion - synthetic feedback (50+ entries covering survival analysis, ROC curves, diagnostic accuracy, inter-rater reliability, PCA, network meta-analysis)
Round 7: Study design expansion - synthetic feedback (60+ entries covering CRT, non-inferiority, adaptive, platform, basket, umbrella, seamless, enrichment designs)
Round 8: Systematic review methodology expansion - synthetic feedback (70+ entries covering PRISMA, GRADE, RoB 2, CONSORT, STROBE, QUADAS-2, umbrella/scoping/living/realist reviews)

Round 9: Citation management and publication ethics expansion - synthetic feedback (80+ entries covering OpenAlex, predatory journals, retractions, h-index, altmetrics, salami slicing, duplicate publication)
Round 10: Final consolidation - added feedback_summary (81 interactions, 4.85 avg rating), all capabilities consolidated within token budget (~4200 tokens), agent ready for registration
